scripts.adb:reverse: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090
scripts.android:build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:debug: cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*
scripts.android:clean-debug: find android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* -type f -not -name 'ic_stat_onesignal_default*' -delete && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && git restore android/app/version.properties android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.android:debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.android:release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:release-adb: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:facebook-key-hash-generate: keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.ios:pods-dev: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && pod deintegrate  && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:pods-production: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && pod deintegrate  && pod setup && PRODUCTION=1 pod install
